title: [SOLVED]820-3437-b restarts when u press power buttun
message:
Hi all,

Thiis is liquid damaged board damaged SMC area. Earlier Green light no power. After replacing R5173/R5192/R1802/C5013/C5011 , power up booting normally. only issue is when u shutdown cant start with the power buttun. Or if you try to power off before booting pressing the power buttun it reboots. SMC_ONOFF_L  is 3.3v. R1802 both side 3.3v present.

Any idea where to check..?

title: [SOLVED]820-3437-b restarts when u press power buttun
message: SMC_ONOFF going low if you press the power button. Could also very well be crap under the SMC.

title: [SOLVED]820-3437-b restarts when u press power buttun
message: Hi Duke, Just to let you know that this was solved after reballing SMC. Thank you so much for your support.
